Product.Title: Harry Potter Boxed Set (Adult Edition)
Product.Subtitle: Volume 1 - 7, paperback
Product.ShortDescription: This is a fabulous opportunity to finally own all seven Harry Potter titles - Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone , Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets , Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban , Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire , Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix , Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince and Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows - in a fantastic boxed set.
Product.LongDescription: This is a fabulous opportunity to finally own all seven Harry Potter titles - Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone , Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets , Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban , Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire , Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix , Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince and Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows - in a fantastic boxed set.
